General.Name: PHP Ventures Acquisition Corp
General.Description: PHP Ventures Acquisition Corp. does not have significant operations. It intends to effect a merger, capital stock exchange, asset acquisition, stock purchase, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses. It intends to focus on consumer-facing companies in Africa. The company was incorporated in 2021 and is based in Subang Jaya, Malaysia.
General.Address: Corporate Tower Subang Square, Subang Jaya, Malaysia, 47500
